website_summaries.verdict: Good reception, respectable video quality, and a basic EPG make the RCA DTA800 an excellent DTV converter box, and its included remote is the best we've seen.
pros: excellent remote, especially for those with poor eyesight
works with Smart Antennas, analog pass-through
cons: doesn't work well with wide-screen TVs

customer_reviews.title: If you love the old shows..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great converter box for those that still have analog TV's. It provides the conversion so you can get local channels without cable or satellite and works great with the new paper thin antennas. It' s easy to install but you need to supply your own RCA cables. Never miss Gilligan's Island or Perry Mason again by bringing in those hidden channels that the pay services don't provide, like Me TV, Antenna TV and the extra PBS channels.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Worked a short time, then no audio
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Sept of last year, and I used it one day to check on signal availability with my inside antenna. Due to poor signal from my antenna, I put it back into the box to try again after I installed an exterior antenna. This weekend I hooked it up to my new antenna and it worked great--for a day. This morning there was no audio. I tried the mute button, volume control, turning the unit off and on, and unplugging and replugging all connections. No luck. A different make and model converter box work fine, so I guess this one was a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Dann Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tried to remove unwanted channels from the scans, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to remove unwanted channels from the scans, but it refuses to remain on scan (deleted). Channels just pop back in the mix. had to constantly reset "unwanted channel scan" each time that I turned it on. Also, when it drifted off channel search it goes blank (the audio) though the video to a set channel remains perfectly clear! I forgot to order another one in it's place because I ordered another one (RCA) and accepted the loss. The second one was non-refundable or returnable (my over sight.) So I lost over $80 on both.
customer_reviews.author: melvin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY 2008 version...  almost at end of useful life ATSC 3.0 comes out in 2020
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would. Right now it is only useful as a chew toy for my dog. This item is not Amazon returnable. This bit of information is not placed anywhere on the listing for the item. Advertisement was totally inaccurate in the wording. I cannot use with my TV as it has no HDMI port. Box illustration doesn't show this. RCA made this converter box back when OTA signals were starting. Dated.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine one minute and stopped the next. I turned it off to take a nap, came back and tried to turn it back on and nothing. The standby light would turn on, but not blue. Something must be faulty with the power supply. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works Quite Well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for newer tv also. I have a newer tv but I don't have the remote anymore. I use this box along with the remote that came with it. The picture is crisp and clear, and the channels come in good. I get about 26 channels at the most because of where I live. It was easy to set up, and I love the antenna mode in setup, that lets you know strong your antenna is, and you can adjust it from that. Overall, I am pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Jewels

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI and Old Technology
customer_reviews.text: Does not have HDMI slot to install my firestick, Reception is not very good as the cheaper box. And it does not pull in as many channels as the cheaper box does. The Remote works very good. Not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: George Dishman

customer_reviews.title: Some Technical Problems interfacing with non-RCA TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought the this "moderately" expensive converter box to use on my old Zenith. The Zenith one was almost $150 ---- probably an attempt to get you to buy a new TV. I sometimes have to turn it off/on again. It's not the antenna because I bought a tall, adjustable rotating antenna. I hired a tech to remove old dish, install antenna, and make sure all the cables were hooked up correctly. However, between the converter box and antenna, it's already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: South Florida Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly unreliable
customer_reviews.text: When I come home at the end of the day I often find that the converter box has turned itself off, instead of just the TV being turned off. It also turns itself off if the TV's been on too long. Not sure this is an overheating safeguard but it is annoying. Also when there's a signal interruption the station audio 'spazzes' so you have to change channels to get it to stop. I also don't like the fact that the remote doesn't have a recall button so you can go back to the previous channel. If my TV continues to need another converter box I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sperlaine

customer_reviews.title: Very good digital box
customer_reviews.text: Primarily to be able to re-scan my channels. And it worked like a charm!! Very good quality, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lovio

customer_reviews.title: digital to ac receiver
customer_reviews.text: it works great, but the remote doesn't. Oh well...manual operation of the tv never hurt anyone. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: darn good
customer_reviews.text: This box works but I have to move the antenna depending on what channel I want to watch. There are about twenty Spanish channels which is a language I don't speak. There are several movie channels which show old classic movies. There are a couple of channels which show very old sitcoms like Hazel and Dennis the Menace. I get all major networks if I move the antenna. I did not buy an antenna and am using a Sony stereo antenna that I found behind the stereo. If someone can recommend a cheap tv antenna, I would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: roundwood

customer_reviews.title: Good little DTV converter
customer_reviews.text: I have a Magnavox DTV converter for another old TV and like it fine. The RCA seems to have more features than I have run across on the Magnavox. Really like that there is a 'gauge' setting to find the strongest antenna signal by looking at the 'gauge' and listening to a 'beep' rather than trying to watch what is happening on the screen. The only thing I don't like is that a red light comes on when it is turned off; don't like using electricity when it's not on. Doesn't seem to generate heat. I need to check and see if I can unplug it without losing the scanned channels.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Easy installation. If I can install it, anyone can !! Picture quality is amazing. Would purchase again. Seller even included a nice hand written thank you.
customer_reviews.author: yelobrd

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product - has additional uses
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my digital T.V. The reason being, I can connect a DVD recorder that needs a cable box output to record programs. Have an aerial antenna (not satellite or cable.) Have it set so that both the t.v. and box come on simultaneously. Second one I have had since 2009. I like this one due to reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I bought a good replacement from Best Buys
customer_reviews.text: The converter did not scan the channels completely and was returned but the distributor would not accept a return. They would allow a heavily discounted value for it but the return UPS return address label could not be printed. I bought a good replacement from Best Buys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of its type
customer_reviews.text: Over $40 is a lot to pay for a pass thru device but if you have an older analog TV that you don't want to give up, this is the best way to get over the air digital signal to it. This is absolutely easy to set up and the remote sets it apart as best in class. I really appreciate that you can save or skip channels. My fancy big HDTV doesn't offer this. The only feature missing is the ability to flip back to your last channel with one button. Worth the money even now that the government isn't subsidizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but Goodie
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! Cut the CORD from Verizon and paired with a Mohu antenna now have picture on and OLD OLD tv! Hurrah!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital to Analog Converter.
customer_reviews.text: I recently dropped cable and still wanted to record on my VCR's. This works very well. Just have to put the VCR on channel 3 and set the channel on the RCA converter. You do have to go into the menu and tell the converter not to shut down automatically. I own four of them. My only regret is that this machine has been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: ModernMode

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to replace my basic cable box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when the hubs and I decided to do away with the cable box (and associated monthly payment to Verizon) in our infrequently used guest room. It has worked well for us. We connected it up to one of those paper-thin antennas and rigged the whole thing up on a small TV stand. Our guests have been able to enjoy all the usual over-air broadcast channels, plus a few music channels. The remote is easy to operate (very few buttons) and so far we have not had any problems with this unit. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coburn-SchillTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Plastic Box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for only three days and it loses the audio in the middle of a program. I have to close and restart the box for the audio to return. This is a poor quality, cheap plastic box, and I will be calling for a refund, since a Return Label was not included with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older TIVO's
customer_reviews.text: We have a series 2 older Tivo box that is analog that we wanted to use with our digital TV and Antenna in our camper. This installed seamlessly with our Tivo and works great. We had bought another brand first that didn't work since it was new company not compatible with the older TIVO's. I had to return that one and order this one. Happy campers now!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: The vendor who is sell*by this antenna I do n[t ...
customer_reviews.text: The vendor who is sell*by this antenna I do n[t beleave he is quite shire how diagnoise it himself. Did it come with instructions. Tried to contact him ,it never answered any questions.but first you must call back after leaviing message no reply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an RCA DTA-800B1 converter box about a month ago, and so far it works great. I had to get a new one because my old one died after about 3 years of use. I am hoping that this one will last longer. I read a bunch of reviews before I bought this, and some say this is the best, but some say this isn't worth the money. I like this one better than my old Magnavox; the buttons on the remote are much bigger, and I can pick up the stations better. I don't know how long it will last, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady13

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that certain features are not provided
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that certain features are not provided. I have an identical converter box purchased in 2009 that displays on screen "What's on Next". Plus the Channel List provides avail. TV channels both ("What's on Now" & "What's on Next") info. Where as this unit do not. Also, missing the smart antenna jack which is also on my 2009 model but not on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hooks

customer_reviews.title: The converter box only picks up half the stations of ...
customer_reviews.text: The converter box only picks up half the stations of my original box and the remote will not program to control my tv as the original remote for this style box did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the device offers good reception.
customer_reviews.text: I am able to record 1 show on my VCR; but the device shuts down automatically after a certain amount of time on the same day. So, the device doesn't stay on long enough so that my VCR can record consecutive days in a row when I am away from my home on vacation. If you are watching live T.V. and not recording, the device offers good reception.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Kado

customer_reviews.title: Price confusion for a used item sold as new
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but it was clearly used because the face plate has numerous scratches. In addition, the price almost doubled when I chose to not buy the extended warranty. I never did get a straight answer from the seller on the price change.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Ryan

customer_reviews.title: We Cut The Cable
customer_reviews.text: And this product, along with an HD antenna, saves us thousands of dollars per year. We don't miss cable TV at all.
customer_reviews.author: Swordman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well with easy setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: This converter box works well and its menus are simple an easy to use. The only issues I have with it are that it's very lightweight, so any cables you attach to it, tend to pull the whole box in whatever direction the cables are trained in. Also, the IR receiver is not very sensitive, so you have to aim the remote fairly precisely at the box in order to get button presses to register.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Ciociola

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was coming with a remotr, nope. It didn't even come with the electrical cord needed to use this item. It's worthless. Wanted to update you. I found someone who had an ac/dc plug and a remote. Hooked it up and it doesn't work. The worst is that per Amazon it's not a returnable item.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Bishop

customer_reviews.title: RCA DTA 8OOB1 Analog to digatal TV Converter Box
customer_reviews.text: i'v not had good sucess with this I suspect I need an antenna but I had just sent one back when one of Amazon's tech. told me over the phone that I would't need an antenna. My not being up on these kinds of things didn't help either. I would appreciate some help on this if possible. I have a RCA TV so I thought this would be a good match I also live 30 to 40 miles away from the TV stations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Remote Falls Short
customer_reviews.text: The DTA-800B1 operates fine and as described, but the remote control falls short of expectations. It is difficult to get it to change channels, volume, off or on, unless pointed directly in line with the DTA-800B1 and at an odd angle above the unit.
customer_reviews.author: B Hill

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Great item at great price. I have paid 3 times as much for less. Seller communicated very, very well. Box showed up with no remote and seller responded lighting fast and sent one the next day. Works great and reception is perfect. Great deal for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: I sure there are better products out there
customer_reviews.text: It works some times, at other times you have to turn it off and on again and again. sometimes the audio does not work. I sure there are better products out there, but it beats paying those large $$$$$ cable bills, and now I get more sleep and watch a lot less tv.
customer_reviews.author: J.Simon

customer_reviews.title: Although it looked pretty new, the battery compartment and batteries were all ...
customer_reviews.text: Remote didn't work. Although it looked pretty new, the battery compartment and batteries were all corroded. I tried to clean it out but that didn't work. The converter box is working but for some reason it turns itself off each time I turn the tv off. No biggie, as long as it comes back on, which it has been. I'm satisfied with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rose E

customer_reviews.title: RCA DTA-800B1 Digital To Analog Pass-through TV Converter Box
customer_reviews.text: The RCA DTA-800B1 Digital To Analog Pass-through TV Converter Box seems to be an OK product, and is priced very competitively. However, it didn't fill the need we had to stream from our analog TV. It may be that we're not electronically savvy enough, so it's probably not a good idea to judge whether to buy it from reading this review.
customer_reviews.author: Handeezhoney63

customer_reviews.title: Other than the crashes though it was easy to set up and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Even after changing the auto power down setting the converter still occasionally "crashes" and requires unplugging and re plugging before it can be turned on. It happens less than once per day but interferes with my tivo recording programs fairly frequently. Other than the crashes though it was easy to set up and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: digital converter works
customer_reviews.text: I found the product would only work when I purchased an antenna with it. I only get 4-6 channels, two of which were in Spanish, THIS and a news channel. If I had known more about the capabilities of the converter, I would have selected the more expensive one, in the hope it would perform better in combination with the antenna. I tried two antennas, one cheap and one expensive and didn't find much difference in amount of channels received. So I have to say this converter works well for its capablity.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Does not work... no returns
customer_reviews.text: The digital box did seem to connect to my TV, the remote would not connect to box, yes I installed batteries. Without the remote you cannot scan for channels. I always prefer to buy on Amazon because the return policy is good, I didn't realize that this would not be eligible for return!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old, old TV with a built in VCR. This converter paired with a simple rabbit ears antenna brings me 24 digital channels, and then converts them to analog for me to watch on TV and record on a VHS tape if I so desire.
customer_reviews.author: R F.

customer_reviews.title: RCA DTA800B1 Digital to Analog Pass-through TV
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to replace an old one we have had for awhile. It works very well to receive the programming we want without depending on cable or other sources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works fine but a little slow
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, but changing channels is a little slow. I don't watch a whole lot of TV so it doesn't bother me much. Also, there is "recall" button on the remote so I end up having to type in the channel number every time which slows down the channel surfing. But other than that, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected; good value for the price. Nothing particularly outstanding about it, but it does what it's supposed to at a reasonable price. Can't really expect any better than that in a product of this kind.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Long-lasting Digital-to-Analogue Converter Box
customer_reviews.text: An easy to set up and use item with plenty of features like signal strength meter, channel scanner, and automatic power saving (amber) stand by mode.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Hi, after two attempts, finally works the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, after two attempts, finally works the way its suppose to. Was told to send back the antenna, never received replacement antenna, live and learn. FYI do not send parts back until you receive replacement parts..i use the cable antenna its on roof .....works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New life to an old Analog Sony TV
customer_reviews.text: Sure glad these are still available. I have an old analog Sony portable that works well but of course only picks up digital signals with a converter. This converter has given my TV new life. I life in an apartment complex and use an inside areal. The reception is beautiful and I am happy with this converter.
customer_reviews.author: charliebargain

customer_reviews.title: Heck w/Cable
customer_reviews.text: Decided to quit paying ridiculous money for direct tv and these converters are the bomb. Get a lot more stations than I ever did on the previous converter boxes I had back in 2009. Easy to install and set up. No more cable bills.
customer_reviews.author: L. DeBerry

customer_reviews.title: This works great. I had to cancel cable TV
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I had to cancel cable TV, could not afford to pay 75.00 a month anymore just to watch TV. I ordered the RCA antenna to work with this converter box. I have found 8 channels so far just using antenna in the house. Nothing outside yet. This is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: oldandugly

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound quality are good, and I was able to get 12 channels ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture and sound quality are good, and I was able to get 12 channels in the middle of Manhattan, though it claimed to reach 32. Possibly somewhere else it might pull in more stations. No cable, of course. More of a stop-gap than a replacement for cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Early

customer_reviews.title: OK performance..
customer_reviews.text: Sender had to send a 2nd time (mis-addressed packaged); overall arrival took longer. Could not figure out the universal remote that came with converter to scan the local tv stations. After days of trying, ordered the original rca hand remote that took a minute to work. Otherwise, the converter works well; however seems to work better under cooler temperatures? Overall, am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: RCA DTA-800B1 Digital To Analog Pass-through TV Converter Box
customer_reviews.text: The RCA TV Converter Box was easy to install and replace the original RCA Converter Box. It is functioning well and have not had any problems; therefore, I am satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A.

customer_reviews.title: Working on cutting the cable cord - Works great along with an antenna - I can get 17 ...
customer_reviews.text: Working on cutting the cable cord - Works great along with an antenna - I can get 17 TV stations in my area - Will be purchasing one for each of my TVs when I finally decide to cut the cable cord.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: HD DIgital Conversion Box
customer_reviews.text: I received the box, however, very disappointed because on my last box which quit working, I was able to preview what was on now and what was coming up next. This box ONLY provides the channel number and whether it is ABC, NBC, CBS, PBS, etc. Very disappointed. Also, I still have to use the TV remote for on/off, mute& volume control. The remote for this box ONLY changes channels. My only hope now is to buy another TV that already has HD built in (yes I won't have the preview available there). At least that way, I will only have one remote to use. Would not buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hutchko

customer_reviews.title: Run away!
customer_reviews.text: Very simply put: powered on and could not pick up a single station that was well within the range of the digital antenna that I attached. Could not even return it to the seller, so Amazon had to step in.
customer_reviews.author: RedSkies

customer_reviews.title: Gives new life to my old CRT TVs!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have two of these boxes and they really work great. Since they are pretty new, I cannot vouch for their long-term reliability so stay tuned. Very good remote, very easy to program, crystal clear reception with indoor Wineguard Flatwave antennas. Free TV - no more cable bills.
customer_reviews.author: dougiestyletone

customer_reviews.title: Going Old School with Converter Box
customer_reviews.text: I use this converter box in a room that I hardly frequent to, and it saved me some funds on replacing my cable box with this box. I get a few more channels than normal, but there are a couple of channels that you have to work the antenna to make it come in clearer, but overall, it works.
customer_reviews.author: shopper7

customer_reviews.title: I could not get it to work; don't know ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work; don't know if it is because the area I live in or the equipment itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shop SE

customer_reviews.title: Way too easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought in combo with the RCA ANT12F High Quality Durable Passive Indoor Antenna and set up at my in-laws house for their old TV. Fast, easy setup, a whole lot of local channels, and great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT
customer_reviews.text: The item didn’t work. Wouldn’t power on at all! Tried returning and getting a new one and it Took forever for them to do it! Was on phone forever. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Estela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My mom still isn't hip to getting cable so I had to replace her first converter box with this one. It was easy to set up and has a few more options then the first one we had. This will see her through until she decides to join us in the 21st century with digital cable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: RCA DTA 800B1 Digital to analog tv converter box
customer_reviews.text: This RCA converter box was exactly what I needed; my old one broke after 3 yrs. I have hooked it up and it works great. Item arrived quicker than expected. Yes, I would order from the company again.. very pleased. Kay in NC 7.6.13
customer_reviews.author: KayM

customer_reviews.title: Love what I get off the air for free
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different converter box in the past and it didn't get very many channels. Several years later I found this one. I get all the local channels and subchannels and then some more. I just plug the original analog antennae into it and it gets great reception. I guess it also depends on your location, but I believe this box is one of the better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Annoymous

customer_reviews.title: TV tuner converter box with simple remote
customer_reviews.text: Works just a expected (had same one on another TV). Like the simple remote. Great if you want simplicity and not all the fancy menu/recordings features that the latest devices have. A little pricey for just the basic functionality.
customer_reviews.author: J Russell Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!.
customer_reviews.text: Works Great!......old RCA box hd gone out after 7 years...Since I hd RCA TV in the bedroom.....Did not hav to put in codes because this box is RCA too!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Our other one crapped out and this one is still working years later... and I have it on all the time. Allows me to still use my Tivo with my digital antennea.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Works good, converts good
customer_reviews.text: Works good, converts good. Can change channels with remote but can't change volume. Have to use TV remote to change volume. Might can be setup to change volume but I have not figured out how.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hand

customer_reviews.title: I bought this used without a remote, then had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used without a remote, then had to buy the remote separately, but they are doing the job well to run the old tv we had and wanted to use in the kitchen, running off an amplified antenna. Buying the converter and remote used was a cheaper solution than a new tv.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT FOR PRICE AND FUNCTION
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to hook up, best tech for the dollar; I have two, then bought new TVs that had the built in capabilities....be sure you really need this before you buy....soon to be outdated.
customer_reviews.author: T. Michael

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and love them.
customer_reviews.text: Everything fine so far. Better picture and larger too because there's no black stripe across the top & bottom! No need for two controls anymore.
customer_reviews.author: consumer J

customer_reviews.title: it working good fast get signal and more option to choice
customer_reviews.text: it working good fast get signal and more option to choice . the remote is clear button number . it good for Older adult get use easily .
customer_reviews.author: MinhTuyen - Le

customer_reviews.title: Good device, easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: worked first time out of the box. Hooked up the tv to the box as instructed (simple directions). Bang, got a good enough signal to please.
customer_reviews.author: elgreco

customer_reviews.title: Works well :)
customer_reviews.text: Works well and can still be used if your dog eats the remote :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and was new in the box as advertised. Easy set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well. It was a gift for a friend who can't get any satellite or cable TV and it has helped them get local news and weather and some other shows also.
customer_reviews.author: gloriahd

customer_reviews.title: A converter box that works.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a converter box that works. The other brand Amazon sells should be pulled from the market forever (starts with a Z). That aside, the RCA works fine - so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy.The antenna I have may need replaced- it is an old $5 one. I get anywhere from 5-12 channels. As for overheating- it's in the woman cave so I unplug it when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Mathews

customer_reviews.title: This the best converter box I have used & owned by far
customer_reviews.text: This the best converter box I have used & owned by far. It is simple & the remote is easy to read & use. Highly recommend this particular converter box..
customer_reviews.author: Interesting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice box to use for local channels,works best with an antenna
customer_reviews.author: StevenMcNamara

customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because I was so disappointed that I could not pick up one channel with this unit. I would never have ordered this converter box if I had known, however, shopping at amazon is such an enjoyable experience.

product_meta.title: RCA DTA-800B1 Digital To Analog Pass-through TV Converter Box
product_meta.description: The RCA DTA800B1 Digital TV Converter is slightly larger than a paperback book and is the ideal solution for consumers who want to keep watching television programs, but don't want to buy a new TV set. It will easily receive over-the-air TV broadcasts and convert them to analog signals that your current TV can display. It's an easy hook-up - just plug in your antenna and connect to your television and you are set. It also includes a Big button remote - one universal remote for your converter box and TV (works with most TV brands).
feature_bullets: Easy hook-up - just plug in your antenna and connect to your television
Big button remote - one universal remote for your converter box and TV (works with most TV brands)
Dual position - offers the best fit with your TV, vertical or horizontal
Smart antenna-ready and displays all digital TV formats
Coax output - connect your TV using coax cable (included), and select channel using CH3/CH4 switch
Basic remote control (Can control a TV as well)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars438 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
